# identifier

**Instance Property**

The identifier for this item.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var identifier: NSTouchBarItem.Identifier { get }
```

## Discussion

This read-only property returns the value the item was initialized with.

For all items other than spaces, this value must be globally unique.

## Identifying a bar item

- **NSTouchBarItem.Identifier**: An identifier for an item in the Touch Bar.
